recipe.title: Sidewalker
ingredients: 3/4 cup pure maple syrup (preferably Grade B)
instructions: Stir first 4 ingredients in a large pitcher. Add 1 cup ice. Cover and refrigerate until well chilled, about 2 hours.
Gently stir in beer and club soda. Fill 12 ounce highball glasses with ice. Divide cocktail among glasses. Garnish with lemon wedges and serve.
